website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Note 9 is an attractive pen-enabled phablet with a fast processor, a terrific modem, and a huge battery.

customer_reviews.title: This is the 2nd Note cell phone that has gone down hill after android updates. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: After the Android update, everything went down hill. I am changing my rating from 4 stars to 1 star. The Note 9 camera is now worse than cheapest phone after the android update. I spent an hour on the phone with Samsung customer support and they claim that because my phone is 1 and 1/2 years old, I should pay $50 to get a system refresh. Samsung was the one who did the update, not me. Plus, the Samsung customer service person told me there was no guarantee that I would get the same quality camera features back, even with the $50 payment. Is this the kind of company you want to deal with after paying $1000 for a phone?
customer_reviews.author: rabbit rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Phone was a stolen phone
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and did not see anyoe mention this but I went to activate the phone at the At&T store and they set it up to work for me and with in 1 hour my service was suspended because the phone was flagged as a stolen phone. I have requested a refund waiting for approval. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Billiejo Yingling

customer_reviews.title: Battery was dead, would not replace even when I offered to pay for the exchange.
customer_reviews.text: NY Post will be publishing an article on their lack of customer service. Should be a good read, includes all phone calls and transcripts of chat. Never buy a device from them, if you have a problem, they will ignore it even if they are the ones who fulfill the order.
customer_reviews.author: Levan Kakutia

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked phone does not work on International carriers
customer_reviews.text: I bought the phone unlocked. However I cannot make or receive any calls when I am traveling in a different country. Also phone does not connect to public wifis in a different country. Horrible phone. Cannot do basics like calling and receiving calls.
customer_reviews.author: NOTE 9 USER

customer_reviews.title: NOT the US Version!
customer_reviews.text: Listing says this is for the US model with US warranty. Item arrived with a sticker that says "International (NO USA GSM) no warranty". Package was already opened and re taped as well. NOT NEW and NOT USA VERSION.
customer_reviews.author: stardewkitteh

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Phone reaches out and finds all of your calendars. At first view, you see your various devices the phone can see. I you click on each device, you will see details on all the connections. I have an add/edit authority on a public internet calendar for our book club. After entering my appointments, etc. , for the next few months, I was advised by one of our members that all of my calendar details were on display on the book club calendar. The warning is to look at the details for each new function you use to record your data.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Was not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Was advertised as unlocked but the part number on the box was a Sprint part number could not activate bought from all out mobile. I kept getting a Sprint omadm
customer_reviews.author: J O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device, just look for a good deal to take advantage of
customer_reviews.text: I got a deal so i paid $800, cor that money it's an excellent device. No phone is worth paying $1000 (i think that djscussion is not the objective of tbis review, at the end is up to you if you want fo pay $1000 :) ). Now regarding ddvice itself. It is excellent. Display and sound quality are excellent, high quality design. Excellent cameras. S Pen is very usdful, new features such as screen off memoz or air commands are awesome. Battery life could be better but it's still good. My only complains are quick charge 2.0 is bad for a 2018 ddvice, i would like infrared port as in oldrr devices
customer_reviews.author: Heynner Troyo

customer_reviews.title: Phone lasted 4 months
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months of good care, the phone began constantly restarting itself. That's not the type of performance I expect from a $1000 phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: Love my Samsung Galaxy Note 9
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Galaxy Note 9 with 128 gigs of storage space is definitely a great phone. I have moved from a Samsung Galaxy Note 4 to a note 9 and I love the 9. there are definitely some major major improvements in it even over the eight from people that I know that have the Note 8. Battery life is much better on the 9. It takes great pictures also and is fast at doing things. And with the add-on micro SD card of 500 gig card lots of room and space for pictures videos or whatever you want to use that for including music.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Note9 crashed after 2 months, and the only way to fix is to ship it to Samsung for 2weeks
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL customer service. Do not buy Samsung!!! EVER!!! If you have a problem, there are very few service centers. The closest one to me is over 2 hours away. The only other option is to send the phone away for 2 weeks... and on top of it they will facttory rest the phone since it is password protected and I had to ship it. There are pleanty of cell repoair places near me, but they won't let me take it there so I am screwed and without a phone for 2 weeks!!! I hate Apple but I will NOT NOT buy Samsung again.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. C

customer_reviews.title: Did not appear to be unlocked...
customer_reviews.text: The Note 9 I purchased did not appear to be unlocked. After lots of searching and confusion and a message and a phone call the seller assured me the phone was unlocked and would work on AT&T even though it said it was network locked to T- Mobile. I took the phone to the AT&T store and they got it working on their network in just a few minutes. Easy peasy. So far the phone is great and working without issues.
customer_reviews.author: David Zahn

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly..love it !
customer_reviews.text: The Note 9 is everything I'd hoped it would be. I'd read all the reviews and made my leap during holiday season 2018..when the price dropped $200 for the unlocked version. I just moved the micro sim card (at&t) from my galaxy s7 over to the note and was up and running straight away. It works perfectly. Samsung also has an app to move all your files and settings over..very painlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone ever
customer_reviews.text: Phone does not work. It's fine for gaming but no one can hear me when I pick up a call. Am using my Moto g6 in place of this item. Also, contacted the seller more than once and have received zero response. I demand a refund for this useless phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jasinski

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Been using the Galaxy Note series since the Note 3. I'm still trying to wrap my head around spending this much money on a phone (upgrading from a Note 5) ... but this (new) Note 9 is a pretty impressive piece of hardware. If you don't need to have the latest and greatest (Note 11), save a few bucks and get the Note 9. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: They worked with me on spen but still don't detect spen
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone but seller did not give me a proper working s pen. I cannot connect I cannot take picks. Very upset about that but all in all I love the phone. I have messaged seller 2x concerning questions with phone but have not received reply. 1st was 5 days ago and 2nd yesterday. Amazon requires me to wait 2 days. I will but then what can I do about my pen Update seller contacted me going to send me or work with me on the spen. I will diff. Change my stars. They sent me a spen. But phone still want detect spen. The seller has worked with me and As promised I am going up on stars
customer_reviews.author: Donetta Casey

customer_reviews.title: Power house phone.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, Awesome. Power house of a phone. Takes some time to learn all the functions on it. And I have spent a lot of time on YouTube watching videos to learn about the powerful features. Most people hate the Bixby feature, but I like it. Most say you hit the button for that feature by accident and don't like it for that. I've had the phone for a month now and I think I hit it by accident one time. It is just a great product all way round.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: I was aware that this was used but not dragged on the floor.
customer_reviews.text: The device that was sent to me was clean but you could tell bad use from the previous owner, two deep scratches on the front and a multiple lines scratch on the top, also the back had a bump so I will be returning this one and respectfully asking for my money back. I didn't even turn it on because it causes distrust to know (as it is so evident) that someone dropped it before. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Anabell Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Best value phone at the moment
customer_reviews.text: I lost my Note 8 so I bought this phone as a replacement until the Note 10 was available. This is the best value at approx $600 when i bought it. Cons: The wifi and bluetooth connectivity is unreliable. Very little lag but there was some. No IR blaster. Pros: Everything else about this phone was amazing... Battery, camera, speed, durability, screen, S-pen, headphone jack, SD card slot for expandable memory, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mareo Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Well done samsung
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. I am a convert from the iPhone and this is just a hands down better engineered phone. Its android, so it some apps suck but there are so many more to pick from, some of the features aren't as 'sophisticated' as an iPhone but there are tons more features. Again, very impressed with the phone. And no problems with quality or it breaking on me, I've also never bought a refurbished phone but I'm done paying full price too.
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Note 10 all day.
customer_reviews.text: Has a physical fingerprint scanner on the back and an Iris scanner on the front along with both an SD card slot and no hole punch in the screen along with being able to use any variety of phone cases. This phone is 1000x more reliable for every day than any Note 10 or 10+ don't even get me started on the rest of 2019's Galaxy lineup.
customer_reviews.author: Zombox

customer_reviews.title: great upgrade from a note 8
customer_reviews.text: didnt need all the new features from the new note 10 so i went with this since its cost-effect and i retain the headphone jack.
customer_reviews.author: daniel pierre

customer_reviews.title: Love my Samsung Note 9
customer_reviews.text: This is a sleek, fast device. I love the stylus, it water resistant and battery last for 2 days of heavy use. The only thing I could do with out is Bixby, but that has nothing to do with device. it is my 3rd note.
customer_reviews.author: Blank

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The ad said unlock, it's not. I took it to Verizon for sim card. They showed me on computer that they couldn't because the phone was still locked. So I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the Note line
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical coming from a Note 8, as I didn't see many reasons to switch. I had issues with getting my Verizon service to work on my Note 8, but I popped a sim in this factory unlocked Note 9, and it instantly picked up the sim and I was able to use Verizon no problem. I also love the SPen, and using it as a remote is a godsend for someone like me, especially getting photos at a weird angle for my job. I can extend my phone out, without having to depress the shutter button, and just click my pen with my other hand. Works every time. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M. Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to invest my money into something thst will not only give me dependability but very user friendly. I love my new phone. Very dependable, more security, dependable. I received my product timely and as described. Seller provided great customer service. If you are in the market for a new pgone, I would recommend this product and the seller to any potential buyer
customer_reviews.author: Kiluwasha

customer_reviews.title: Not for use with Sprint.
customer_reviews.text: Phone is an international model. Print on the box Box was in Spanish as the primary language. Unfortunately this model is not compatible with the Sprint network. Phone must recognize CDMA network for use on Sprint.
customer_reviews.author: chris pardo

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a year or so. Great phone, but I think it is just too big. Also, Samsung needs to stop with the curved screens. They make it easier to drop, harder to protect and weird to watch videos and write notes on. Love the S-pen! Love the fact that it still has a headphone jack.
customer_reviews.author: Chesley Edmunds

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on sale for 600, fantastic deal. Pros: -Great battery -Cool black design -S pen features -Big screen Cons -Comes with Android 9, but I managed to downgrade it to 8.1 so not a big deal Great buy
customer_reviews.author: ruby eslami

customer_reviews.title: Great way to buy a phone for less than from your provider and/or authorized dealer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and took it to Sprint to activate. It needed a new SIM (free) and the transferred all my data. No issues. I am enjoying the better speed and picture quality as well as the upgraded camera.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Walston

customer_reviews.title: Camera takes good pics when it works...
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone except the facial recognition is slow if it even registers at all and the zoom on the phone all but stopped working. It's apparently a common problem with it. I took care of it but the zoom still broke. I can only zoom to 1X magnification before the the camera freaks out. It's an actual mechanical problem with the phone. I took it in and it would cost over $150 to fix... The camera is not durable. The screen cracked in my pocket and now half the screen is completely Jack up.
customer_reviews.author: Dain B

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this used Note 9 from Edge Cellular and I can't even express how thrilled I am about this phone. I got it at a steal of a price, and you can't even tell that it was used before I received it. There's no damage anywhere and the battery life is even better than I expected. It was unlocked as stated in the product description, I just threw in my Metro PCS sim card, and it was ready to go. I highly recommend this seller for your unlocked samsung phone needs!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Modest

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Really great phone. Coming from a lot of $100 phones, this easily surpasses all the phones I've used before. Not to mention, it has a 3.5 headphone jack *coughcough unlike Apple and the Note 10. The ability to just casually write on my screen is the topping on the cake. It has a good battery, good storage, and good ram and processor (comparatively speaking). It has almost every feature I could want.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the best phone
customer_reviews.text: Screen quality is beautiful. Still learning all the changes since my note 5. This phone does everything and more. Great price on Amazon. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: ctohio

customer_reviews.title: The best time to upgrade is now
customer_reviews.text: This is the best price for this phone. And when it comes time to upgrade again, I'll buy it right here.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: My husband was in desperate need of a new phone. This was another Amazon Prime Deal that we took advantage of. Great price and a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Coachmom65

customer_reviews.title: Perfect has it all!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, my hand held "puter". Email txt video has it all good battery
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Bad service
customer_reviews.text: This seller had very bad service and also bad product
customer_reviews.author: aam

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone!! came open but everything in the box and like new conditions. Everything worked as it should just swaped sims and was ready to go
customer_reviews.author: ZmokingZ

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates touchscreen functionality
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions for install, which were quite easy, and it fits over the phone fine, I also did not experience bubbles. HOWEVER, I cannot feasibly text or use the phones touch screen accurately with this on. You really have to tap hard to get it to register the keys you are typing. This makes texting a complete headache and not worth it at all. Do not waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Wiesenberger

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 9, I good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great cell phone with great hardware specifications. Thus is my first time using Samsung. I have switched from iPhone to android. I am satisfied and happy using this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Anil Bhaila

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I love my note 9. It has more features than I will ever use. Battery lasts for a long time. It just updated to Android Pie!
customer_reviews.author: Jimhadar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty satisfied, still  checking out all the cool features
customer_reviews.text: Great since I was upgrading from an iPhone 4....funny how it came with Spanish and the default setting. Had to navigate through the spanish to change it back to english
customer_reviews.author: KURT

customer_reviews.title: INSAINE BATTERY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone it works great with Sprint, just ask them to give you a sim card. Very bright and the battery is amazing. I can go though a whole day and end on 50%
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best Android phone I never got!
customer_reviews.text: I truly like this phone! The screen is just amazing, never felt a lag, and samsung add layer is even useful this time! The only con I would say is the Bixy button (please let us customize this bottom) and this version is not dual sim (I didn't know samsung will make 2 separate version...)
customer_reviews.author: EFILING, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone. I got this on sale new for $649. This is a great upgrade from my old I phone. I will never go back to apple because you get more bang for your buck, and you get more in this phone then the iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product but stinking expensive to get one untouched by carriers which is a big thing for me because they can't put their bloatware on the phone
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: It is not good to sell equipment knowing that is us not good.
customer_reviews.text: The screen is in undesirable condition.. it is imprinted with the images of the previously installed applications. I'm returning this unit I will purchase a phone at a future date.
customer_reviews.author: Quenney61

customer_reviews.title: Shabby phone was sold by Amazon water house as a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Shabby product, Incorrect description of the product......Classified as very good but the product had scratches all over on the screen and back and brushes on the bottom back panel..... Far away from the described product. unsatisfied and disappointed with the purchase.....Returned with in an hour of receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unlocked as advertised?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect buy. Unlocked and perfect condition. Works with all carriers. But as expected, cant put warranty addons from boost mobile. All other carriers can add a protection plan. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Device not unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Just got my Note 9 in the mail today everything seemed to be in order but when I turned the phone on and started to set everything up the device told me that it is restricted. Not unlocked like the seller claimed and I have no way to unlock it so I wasted my time and money with this phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatest work phone.
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've ever owned. Top notch quality. The s pen is unrivaled.
customer_reviews.author: JoJoNeNe

customer_reviews.title: Phone was Unlocked as Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The phone came new in the box. With Charger, and Ear Buds. It was setup for At&t, but when I put in the T-mobile Sim it Updated and changed Networks.
customer_reviews.author: Real Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not unlocked as promised
customer_reviews.text: The item was not unlocked as promises. Very dissapointed as I only found out when attempting to bring my own device to a new cell phonr provider for a discount. Lost out on a $250 gift card with Verizon due to this sellers mistake
customer_reviews.author: Nitin

customer_reviews.title: Best Way To Shop!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best way to buy a new phone. Saved $200 buying on Amazon vs. Sprint store. Loving my new phone and all its features!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Morse

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Performance, Powerful Battery, and Astonishing Screen
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly amazed by all aspects of this that can give. Battery performance, screen resolution, gaming, headphone jack, fast charge, Dolpy Atmos, and most importantly, the S pen. The S pen itself give much more variety on using the NOTE 9. I honestly have no complains at all. Job well done Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulrahman Almutairi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I really like my phone. It offers so much that I'm going to need to take a day to learn it
customer_reviews.author: leasa

customer_reviews.title: STAY WITH IPHONE
customer_reviews.text: Worst phone I've ever bought new, if your questioning whether top stay with iPhone or not the answer is no just no.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: This phone sucks
customer_reviews.text: This phone did a factory reset and I lost EVERYTHING!! IM NEVER BUYING A PHONE ON AMAZON AGAIN!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Judge

customer_reviews.title: Note 9
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal phone! Needs an extra stylus to go with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Slade

customer_reviews.title: Just set up my phone on Verizon. No issues. Wish it came with a sim card though.
customer_reviews.text: Just set up my phone on Verizon. No issues. Wish it came with a sim card though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a US phone as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Received this phone and it worked fine until recent update then it quit working on the phone end and Samsung will not honor it as it was advertised because it was not a US phone! Cannot get service from anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Seeman

customer_reviews.title: Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Have not had it long enough to dislike. So far have nothing but praise for the phone. This is a replacement for my windows phone which I have used in one form or other since they were released. Must say I wish I had gone this route sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Don Hickman

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't function without this phone. I am able to write notes (plus for me). The camera quality is perfect. The only thing I miss is the ability to extend the volume as I did in my note 8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: very satisfied! ordered the 128gb note 9 and came just like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Woodring

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for sprint.
customer_reviews.text: Was not able to use this with Sprint. Tired to deal directly with Samsung to get right phone, they were no help. AMAZON did make it right with refund. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How is this new ?
customer_reviews.text: Came in an at&t box loaded up t-mobile!! How is this new ?!
customer_reviews.author: icemilwaukee76

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST PHONE EVER
customer_reviews.text: OUTSTANDING, I'VE BEEN A GALAXY NOTE FAN FROM THE BEGINNING.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Lit
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of it. And it came extra fast in the mail so yay me
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life
customer_reviews.text: A very beautiful phone. Battery life is one of the best I have ever had in a Samsung phone
customer_reviews.author: Ablamba AMOUSSOU-GUENOU

customer_reviews.title: You can buy from this company
customer_reviews.text: I went from a Note 5 to a Note 9, I have no problems with this phone it was a great value I appreciate the affordability.
customer_reviews.author: Tina F. Wherry

customer_reviews.title: No video call option.
customer_reviews.text: Note that you will NOT be able to make video calls with a factory unlocked phone. Other then that phone works great.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Gillitteraty
customer_reviews.text: This note 9 phone is fully satisfying, durable, reliable, and rationally design device. I only wish they use diamond glass rather gorilla glass for long gevity.
customer_reviews.author: Freezer

customer_reviews.title: best phone
customer_reviews.text: this phone is just like its described. I am glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Able to give presentations from phone and takes great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my adult son and he is very happy. He feels notes are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kymist

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I consider this a better deal than the new note 10.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the performance of this phone. Battery life has not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: I heart Labradors

customer_reviews.title: Don't think.. just buy !
customer_reviews.text: Writing a review for the first time.. just for this phone !! Its a beast ! At a DIFFERENT LEVEL and I still haven't used the pen that much! Don't think.. just buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New phone
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his phone. But everything was originally in Spanish.
customer_reviews.author: Amber McClure

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product with best quality.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, battery life also is good.I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mukti Prasad Pattnaik

customer_reviews.title: missing contents, no seal
customer_reviews.text: its super frustrating, no seal at all, 3 to 4 missing parts, no warranty card. seems like somebody already used it. dont buy it. its a fraud and i would report it every where.
customer_reviews.author: syed shah

customer_reviews.title: I Like Samsung Phones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone as an upgrade to an older Samsung Phone that had Bricked. I'm very happy with every aspect of the new phone. The Battery life is crazy good, and is a major reason I bought the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lang Strimpel

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my girl and she's loving and charged last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: TchoucoD

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Cracked in screen , s pen is loose and all chewed up .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: So far its been problem free, battery life is great, screen is great, pen is awesome to use on the screen and taking selfies
customer_reviews.author: Edlaley

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I got the product fast. And was able to activate this phone without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Liens

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical before buying it up to now everything work flawless!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lee Placheta

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, excellent phone.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is all day the way I use it, with superb screen quality. It is also very responsive. Excellent phone.
customer_reviews.author: Danarmstro

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PHONE TAKES BEST PICTURES EVER
customer_reviews.text: It's a AWESOME phone. Very quick shipping. Only thing I was disappointed with, is it didn't come with a manual book
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHONE I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Great phone , fantastic price , works great with Tmobile. I love Amazon the best customer service in the world Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Ease of operation
customer_reviews.text: Takes some getting used to. Liked my note 4 better.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not a new phone and not an unlocked one as described in the description.
customer_reviews.text: Not a new phone and not an unlocked one as described in the description.
customer_reviews.author: ch.saimahesh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for less than retail price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. Brand new spanking note 9 no complaints looking to keep this guy for a while B)
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from galaxy Note 3. So glad I did it's a beast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to activate on sprint.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get it activated on sprint. After 6 hours, 4 trips to the sprint store,and 4 SIM cards later, still no luck. The phone keeps auto locking the SIM card which leads to an error message of “SIM card locked allow power down and contact customer service if problem persists”. Sprint said take it to Samsung. Samsung says take it to sprint. Unfortunately I’m not wasting anymore time trying to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: JaXx910

customer_reviews.title: SELLER WIRELESS ZONE ARE CARRIER SPECIFIC. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone through the seller Wireless zone. Listed as a Samsung unlocked phone. What I received, as you can clearly see in the pictures, is an AT&T phone. I am one very unhappy customer who immediately returned this phone. This seller would not be allowed to list an item as factory unlocked when it is obviously carrier specific. If I could give this NO STARS, I would. Thank goodness Amazon is awesome to work with it I would be out over $600 for a phone I came use.
customer_reviews.author: JBoydTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - Phone has NO US Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Even though the image and description say there is a US warranty. There is NOT on the one they sent me. When I tried to register the phone with Samsung it came back that it is not a US phone and that it is an international phone. When I set it up it was all in Spanish. I should have realized it then. This is false advertisement and should be illegal and I am shocked that Amazon even allows it. It's a HUGE gamble if you get this phone and something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Fritchen

customer_reviews.title: Do your homework Before you buy.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a pretty big let down for me. I switched from an apple iPhone 7 plus. To this Galaxy, and it really wasn't worth the switch or the price I played for this phone. The service data is very bad quality. In places I had 4G LTE on my iPhone. I dnt even have 3G on this Note 9. And I know it's not the Cell provider. It's the phone. The fingerprint scanner is just not what it is on the iPhone's as well. I'm just not very impressed. Probably going to go back to iPhones. Unless someone can change my mind?
customer_reviews.author: Deanese Polushkin

customer_reviews.title: Love the Spen
customer_reviews.text: Excellent like new condition. Everything was included except the SIM tool. Phone is larger than expected but has a one hand use option. Battery life is incredible. I went from charging 2-3x day to it lasting a day and a half. This phone is up to date on security patches and software and is a true workhorse. Highly recommended buying from this seller. He backs up his products.
customer_reviews.author: Crystaldeals

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience, phone restarts on its own!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my phone about half an hour ago and the box didn’t look like anew box, ripped and torn from the corner. This phone is a big scam, It turns off by itself, every time I’m trying to install something through the play store, phone gets hot and turns off. I thought buying a new one will help but this is Horrible, need my money back!!!
customer_reviews.author: AMINA JABRI

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Note9 N960U 128GB Unlocked 4G LTE Phone w/ Dual 12MP Camera - Midnight Black
product_meta.description: The new super powerful Note. The largest battery in a Note, ever. When you have a long lasting battery, you really can go all day and all night. This model is not compatible with 5G. Comes with Single nano SIM Port
feature_bullets: The largest battery in a Note, ever. When you have a long lasting battery, you really can go all day and all night
The Note9 has twice as much storage as the Note8, which means more music, more videos, more pictures, and less worry when it comes to space on your phone
The Note9 gives you a quick network connection for incredibly fast streaming and downloading, so you can do more, uninterrupted.Bluetooth:5.0
Still amazing on screen, but now the S Pen has more power off screen. Remotely control different applications and use the S pen to capture shots from far away, scroll, and play music
At 6.4 Inches, the Note9 has the largest screen of any Galaxy phone. Perfect for gaming and streaming, our Super AMOLED display is bigger than ever before
Connectivity Wi Fi: 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac 2.4G+5GHz, VHT80 MU MIMO,1024 QAM
